property.name: lru.files.per.thread
property.description: the number of global files to write at the beginning for each thread

property.name: lfu.files.per.thread
property.description: the number of global files to write at the beginning for each thread

property.name: lfu.cold.files.per.thread
property.description: the number of global files to write at the beginning for each thread

property.name: block.size.bytes
property.description: the block size of a file

property.name: buffer.size.bytes
property.description: the size of the buffer read and write once

property.name: read.type
property.description: the ReadType of the read operation, now only used for TachyonFS

property.name: write.type
property.description: the WriteType of the write operation, now only used for TachyonFS
